name: hudi
description:
Apache Hudi stands for Hadoop Upserts Deletes and Incrementals. Hudi
manages the storage of large analytical datasets on DFS.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
Binary distribution of the IBM Java Software Development Kit for big and
little-endian powerpc (power7, 8 and 9). Note: IBM is fairly aggressive
about taking down old versions, so old (and even current) versions may
not be available.

dependencies.name: maven
dependencies.description: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool.
